column5: Open floor plan with spacious living room and kitchen. Located 3 minutes from Johnson Space Center (20 miles from downtown). Bedroom features queen size bed and 42 in TV. Living room has 48 inch TV, both equipped with cable. All furniture is 1 year old. Loveseat and couch COULD accommodate more if needed. Dining area is occupied, but not cluttered, with exercise equipment. But there is dining space with 4 bar stools at the bar countertop.
